title: Create Lithology Model
description: A geologist creates a 3D model of the different rock types (lithologies) in a deposit, which is fundamental for all other mine planning.

tasks.description: Interpret and define the boundaries between different rock types on multiple 2D cross-sections based on drillhole logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rock type boundaries are digitized on all sections.

tasks.description: Create 3D wireframe surfaces for each rock type by linking the interpretations between sections.
tasks.expected_outcome: 3D solids representing each rock unit are created.

tasks.description: Use the final lithology model to constrain the resource estimate, ensuring grades are only estimated within the correct rock units.
tasks.expected_outcome: The resource model is updated and improved by using the new lithology model.
